abstract: President Obama and his campaign have studied, and to a striking degree are replicating, the Bush re-election playbook.
snippet: President Obama and his campaign have studied, and to a striking degree are replicating, the Bush re-election playbook.
lead_paragraph: He'll have hundreds of millions of dollars, the bully pulpit, Air Force One and high-profile supporters from Warren Buffett to Lady Gaga behind him. But President Obama's chances of re-election could come down to a single strategic question: To what degree can the history of 2004 be repeated in 2012?
